abstract: Ridicules rept Jews plan to form army to aid Brit
snippet: LONDON, Sept. 2 (AP)--Plans were announced tonight for assembling a world-wide Jewish army to fight beside the British against the racial arch-foes of Jewry headed by Chancellor Adolf Hitler's Nazi legions....

headline.main: PLAN JEWISH ARMY TO BATTLE HITLERISM; British Conferees to Seek 100,000 in World-Wide Recruiting

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sept. 2 (AP)--Plans were announced tonight for assembling a world-wide Jewish army to fight beside the British against the racial arch-foes of Jewry headed by Chancellor Adolf Hitler's Nazi legions.
